sentences.en: a builder’s yard
sentences.cn: 建筑工地

sentences.en: a hundred yards away
sentences.cn: 100码外

sentences.en: a timber yard
sentences.cn: 木场

sentences.en: an area of 9,000 square yards
sentences.cn: 面积为9,000平方码的一片区域

sentences.en: golf continues to inspire books by the yard.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫球运动继续促进书籍大量出版。

sentences.en: He and Hannah had been scuffling in the yard outside his house.
sentences.cn: 他和汉娜一直在他房外的院子里扭打。

sentences.en: He had pitched his tent in the yard.
sentences.cn: 他在院子里搭起了帐篷。

sentences.en: He was frog-marched through the kitchen and out into the yard.
sentences.cn: 他被扭住双臂强推着走过厨房，来到院子里。

sentences.en: I got on the phone to Inspector Joplin at Scotland Yard.
sentences.cn: 我与伦敦警察厅的乔普林巡官通过电话了。

sentences.en: I saw him standing in the yard.
sentences.cn: 我看到他站在院子里。

sentences.en: She sat on a chair in the flagged yard.
sentences.cn: 她坐在铺着石板的庭院里的一把椅子上。

sentences.en: The carpet of leaves in my yard became more and more noticeable.
sentences.cn: 我的院子里的落叶越来越厚。

sentences.en: The grass in the yard was waist high.
sentences.cn: 院子里的草有齐腰高。

sentences.en: The investigation is being handled by Scotland Yard's anti-terrorist branch.
sentences.cn: 调查由伦敦警察厅反恐部门负责。

sentences.en: The kids were playing in the back yard.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在后院玩耍。

sentences.en: The moon cast a bright light over the yard.
sentences.cn: 明亮的月光洒在院子里。

sentences.en: The train backed out of Adelaide Yard on to the Dublin-Belfast line.
sentences.cn: 火车倒出了阿德莱德调车场，开上了都柏林-贝尔法斯特线。

sentences.en: The yard held a few straggly bushes.
sentences.cn: 庭院里有几处蔓生的灌木丛。

sentences.en: There was a permanent 20-yard queue for the portable toilets.
sentences.cn: 流动厕所前总排着20码长的队伍。

sentences.en: They found Trish sitting on the cobbles of the stable yard.
sentences.cn: 他们发现翠茜坐在场院的鹅卵石地上。

sentences.en: They keep chickens in the back yard.
sentences.cn: 他们在后院养鸡。

words.tran_cn: 码数；按码计算；火车站内栏舍之使用费
院子；[计量]码（英制中丈量长度单位，1码=3英尺）；[建]庭院；帆桁

phrases.tran_cn: 铁路调车场；铁路货运编组站
n. 海军工厂；海军船坞
n. 苏格兰场（伦敦警察厅）

trans.tran_cn: 院子，场地，园圃，码（长度单位，等于91
trans.tran_en: an enclosed area next to a building or group of buildings, used for a special purpose, activity, or business
